reviewText: Great movie, whole family likes it. My 3 year old daughter wants to watch it every night!

I loved how the development of the relationship between Hiccup and Toothless was not rushed.  This is just a great story about not believing stereotypes, determination, and always doing what you believe is right.

Great for all the family, even the adults will enjoy the film. Great fun and good graphics. The Father demonstrates magnificently how not to listen and how to bully and dominate a son but, of course, comes through positive in the end. All new fathers should watch and take note.

I just bought it couple of weeks ago. But my kids (2 & 5 yrs) might have watched it at least 20 times!!! Great animation, greast imgaination in the story & characters and great music = Great family entertainment. You cannot go wrong with this movie if you are buying for kids. of course equally entertaining for adults also.

Extremely fast shipping and great quality!
One of my favorite movies.
I love this movie! It was used but plays well.
It is a very good movie.
This is so cute! I love the story and the animation.
Love this movie! So happy to have this as part of our family collection.
Beautiful films, and it's made even more so on Blu-Ray. One of the best animated films I've ever seen.
